Frequency Agility Protocol HW macros
[Frequency Agility Protocol]

Hardware dependent macros for FAP. More...

Defines

#define FAP_INIT_TIMER()   (TCCR0A = 0x02, TCCR0B = 0x03, OCR0A = 200)
#define FAP_NRF_INIT_IRQ()   (EICRB = 0x08)
#define FAP_NRF_IRQ_ENABLE()   (EIMSK = EIMSK | 0x20)
#define FAP_NRF_IRQ_DISABLE()   (EIMSK = EIMSK & 0xDF)
#define FAP_TIMER_IRQ_ENABLE()   (TIMSK0 = 0x02)
#define FAP_TIMER_IRQ_DISABLE()   (TIMSK0 = 0x00)

Detailed Description

Hardware dependent macros for FAP.

These macros enables and disables interrupts the FAP depends on. They must be implemented according to the hardware being used.
